name: Indomitable
trigger: when you fail a saving throw
effects: reroll the saving throw and add a bonus equal to your Fighter level
you must use the new roll
limits: once you use this feature, you cant use it again until you finish a long rest
you can use it twice between long rests starting at level 13 and three times starting at level 17
